name: ZOMBIE FEAST
description:
What, you thought it was just another game about killing zombies? Not cool, man!

Select the correct food to feed the zombies.

Completed orders = More Points.

Complete as many orders as possible in 2 minutes!

(This game was created in 3 hours for the TriJam 3 Hour Game Jam #50)

Software Used: Construct 2, Adobe Photoshop
